entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
